sentence.Network_en: I'll tell you all about it if you can hugger mugger me.

sentence.Network_en: They did it all hugger - mugger.

sentence.Network_en: He engaged in the hugger - mugger of international finance.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 爱思英语论坛 - Powered by Discuz! Board ... hi-fi (高保真的)， hugger-mugger (秘密的)， itty-bitty (极小的).
十.八.口.人.拼在一块是什么字_百度知道 ... [keep sth. secret] 保守事物的秘密,不使泄漏 [hugger-mugger] 密而不宣.

list.abs: The rooms are all in hugger - mugger ., 房间都凌乱不堪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in sense 2 of the noun): probably related to huddle and to dialect mucker 'hoard money, conceal'. This is one of a number of similar formations from late Middle English to the 16th cent., including hucker-mucker and hudder-mudder, with the basic sense 'secrecy, concealment'

means.word_mean: 1. a state of confusion; ritual accompanied by complicated and purposeless activity that obscures and confuses;

means.word_mean: 2. conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods;
